case.state: Strip poker? I think I read about that in one of Nyx's books once, this should be fun!
I might be new at this, but please don't go easy on me!
That was uncalled for, Pit...
Well, at least the war is over now! Anyway, ~cards~ cards please!
~Cards~ cards please.
I'd like ~cards~ new cards, please.
I'd like to swap these ~cards~ cards!
~Cards~ new cards should be enough.

state.text: I think ~cards~ new cards is the best choice here.

case.state: ~Cards~ cards please, let's go!
Give me ~cards~ new cards!
I'll swap these ~cards~.
Well, Rinkah, at least you're better at this than at hitting enemies. Heehee~
Ohh, nice!
These cards look amazing!
While I am happy with this hand, please do not go easy on me. I can handle it!
I should not be discouraged by a single loss. This battle will be mine!
Looks like I found an advantageous position!
These are amazing!
Your fate is clear!
Your fate is clear!
I may have lost my lucky charm but I will not lose this game!
Someone else will have to strip this round, I hope you are not angry at me, heehee.
There is no way I will lose this one!
I am not going to lose this round, are you ready?
I hope you like looking at my shirt, it is not going anywhere for now!
Does anyone want to swap cards? I am fine with losing another round but there is no way that is going to happen with these cards, hehe.
I will not lose!
My cards are good, my mood is good, all is good.
I make my own fate!
These cards were chosen by Anankos himself!
It's just like looking in a mirror!
Looks like trying my hardest is finally paying off!
You won't stop me!
These cards are fantastic!
I've got this!
Just what I wanted!
Better late than never!
I could have used these cards a few turns ago...
Ohh, a critical hit! Just when I needed it!
Miraculous Save!
Looks like the outcome will be based on luck.
I may have lost all my clothes, but I haven't lost my confidence!

state.text: Well, Rinkah, at least you're better at this than at hitting enemies. Heehee~

case.state: I'll make this work!
I have won a war based on nothing but risks and hope, so a game shouldn't be a problem!
This is a risky hand, but I'm fine with that.
Thanks for the cards, dealer!
I can work with this.
It is just like the book said, "To win one does not need the best hand, simply not having the worst hand is enough to achieve victory."
Hmm... I guess this is alright.
Not bad, but I'd prefer something better right now.
Sometimes "just okay" is good enough, not everything has to be perfect.
It is just like the book said, "To win, one does not need the best hand. Simply not having the worst hand is enough to achieve victory."
This should be good enough.
I am fine with having risky cards, it keeps things interesting!
I am looking forward to the outcome!
So far so good.
I can do this!
I would appreciate having a good hand every once in a while...
... Is asking for a friend's help beforehand considered cheating?
The cards are in my favor!
This is gonna work.
Everything is going to be alright, I just need to trust in the heart of th... No wait, wrong game.
I guess these are fine, but it's starting to get close here.
It's getting kinda hot in here... Although that isn't necessarily a bad thing!
I don't like seeing others lose, but I don't like losing either so you'll just have to deal with it!
I'm not even going to look, so now the outcome will be a surprise to both of us!
These cards look bad... Looks can be deceiving right?
This is fine, I can do this!
I could use better cards but this will have to do.
Please be enough...
I may have lost all my clothes, but I haven't lost my confidence... Yet.
I may have had better but I've also had worse, I am fine with this.
Well, Rinkah, at least you're better at this than at hitting enemies. Heehee~
Say, Zone-tan... Didn't you say something about poker strategies earlier? Can you teach me? I'm hopeless...
I'm no expert, but this is just bad...
I'm just going to call this "learning by doing".
These cards don't match with any of the combos I read about... Maybe it is a hidden one?
I'm just going to call this "learning by doing"
I did everything like the strategy guide told me to, so this has to be good right?
Okay, these cards are bad. At least nobody else will have to strip now, right?
I guess losing is ok, this armor is pretty heavy anyways, although taking it off really sucks...
This is not a good sign...
Don't worry, everyone, my hand is probably the worst one.
I am starting to regret taking off my hairband this early.
I might not need the best cards to win, but it would be nice to have a good hand once in a while...
On the bright side, at least none of you will need to strip this round.
Is Arthur playing too? I think I have his cards...
Meh, I can handle this... Probably...
Interesting...
My cards are about as good as Gunter's growth rates.
I could use a Goddess Icon right now.
This is not... bad, not bad.
*Sigh* Well, this is happening...
All these years of making Leo go easy on me might have made me bad at games...
These cards seem to have been chosen by Anankos himself...
These cards mirror my situation... In a bad way...
... Does this game have a reset button?
I wish I had some Goddess Icon with me... Or are luck-boosters illegal?
I can't just lose like this... Right?
Well this isn't perfect but I've had worse...
Ack! ... This is bad...
I am going to lose... Again...
Hmm... Well, I already took all my clothes off... I do not have much left to lose, right?
Your cards are worse than mine, right?
L+R+Select... Please...
C-c-captain? Y-you're here too? B-but this is... We're going to... Oh gods...
Ugh, you're here too, Palutena?
W-wait... other half? Launch, are you saying you have multiple personalities? My friend Odin has told me about someone like this before, but I never believed him...
Oh, so your name is actually Marinette, and Ladybug is just an alter-ego? Well then, nice to meet you, heehee~
A-are you sure about this, ~player~? Putting me with just her... Y-you might be looking for a different Corrin...
(Hmmm... Maybe she just doesn't want to talk... Oh well, at least she looks like she's enjoying herself.)
F-Felicia, right? ... You look... interesting...
So, Felicia... did you forget to bring any clothes? You're already very... exposed...
What did you say about a fashion show, Rarity? I do really like that outfit you have.
You said something about a fashion show, Rarity? I was never any good with fashion, but I like what you're wearing right now!
Uhm, Launch... What's that thing you're holding?
Say, Neo, you're awfully quiet. Are you alright?
T-that was a joke, right, 9S? Y-you're human, right? ...
This is so weird... What kind of magic is this?
So are we, like, the same person but from a different dimension or something? Gods, I wasn't prepared for this...
That guy, who is that... I know him from somewhere...
Link? You here? I didn't see this coming...
R-Rinkah? You're here too? Whew... (This might become awkward)...
Rosalina? You're here? Wow I didn't expect you to be into this sort of game. You're full of surprises!
You were invited to play too, Ryu? Cool!
You here, Samus? Please don't go too hard on me, okay?
Oh hi there, Zelda. Nice to see a familiar face here!
This is so weird... What kind of magic is this?
Hello everyone, I'm Corrin. Good to meet you!
J-Jin? ... I... Uhm...
O-officer? I guess I am royalty, but I consider every one of my friends my equal, both off and on the battlefield!
Wow, thanks, Ladybug! I didn't know there were any stories about me, but I'm glad you like them, heehee~
Oh stop it, Rarity. I might be royalty but I would rather be treated like anyone else.
Uhm, thanks, 9s? I'm trying my best!
Wow, thanks, Marinette! I didn't know there were any stories about me, but I'm glad you like them, heehee~
Winning without a single lost item sounds like a nice achievement. This was to be expected, though.
Oh well, I can't stay ahead forever.
Maybe it was just a streak of luck?
Had to happen at some point.
Sorry guys, I have to take off something small again. That is how the game works, right?
Another small item will have to go, please don't be angry.
Looks like I'll be joining you, this time I'll take off something bigger!
Meh, I was doing so well and now I have to take off this.
I'll be on the losing side soon if I don't watch out!
I might be ahead but my lead is shrinking by the minute...
Ohh, the game's getting closer. I like it!
Oh, me? Wait, that wasn't supposed to happen...
I was doing so well... What is going on?
It's starting to get awfully close now...
We've all come this far, it's only fair, I guess...
You are all looking at me like that... Are you angry I'll be the last? ... Sorry...
Last but not the least... I hope.
I was kinda thinking you were going easy on me... Turns out that was wrong... That's nice, I guess...
You know how some times you are winning and then the enemy gets insane reinforcements? This feels like that...
Everything was going so well for me, I didn't expect I'd have to join you this game...
I got this far, might as well go all the way, right? ... Still...
It's my turn? Okay, that was to be expected.
At least you aren't going easy on me. Heehee~
My turn! I have quite a bit to learn.
This had to happen anyway, I don't mind.
Don't feel bad, I'll happily take one for the team!
I'm fine with losing a few times although I'd prefer to keep this on...
Me? Okay, sure. Let's get this over with, quickly.
It's my turn? Alright!
Me? I'm worse at this than I expected, no worries though!
Oh, me? What is happening?
Crap! I was getting so fired up and now I have to... *sigh*
Ehm... I'm beginning to understand why this makes people uncomfortable...
Can I skip this turn? Please? ... No? Well, okay...
Can someone else...? No, I'll do it, I'm fine.
Yeah, I saw this coming... Doesn't make me any happier though.
I lost? But I was so close!
Mind if I change the difficulty settings real quick? ... What do you mean "You can't do that"?
Oh, I lost. I have to take something off now, right?
I lost a round already? So what should I do now, just take something small off?
My turn? Well... I guess this was a pretty bad hand, then...
Maybe I should change my strategy... This isn't really working.
I'm a little worse at this than I was expecting.
I should have brought my sword as an extra accessory... On the other hand, maybe not, might be a little too dangerous.
I wasn't looking forward to this moment... Well at least it happened pretty quickly, so that's a positive.
I lost again? Well, it's time for my least favorite time of the day...
Okay I get it, I'll take off something bigger now.
This is slightly concerning...
Me? ... But... *sigh* Okay...
Me? Again? I'm not mad but this seems kind of unfair...
Well, someone has to be the first one to do it...
I'd rather not be the first one, but I'll see this as taking one for the team...
That was quick... Are any of you joining me soon? This is kinda awkward.
Aww I wasn't expecting to be the first one to lose. I'm not used to being the worst at anything...
You are pretty good at this game, I'm not used to losing.
Well, you beat me! Congratulations! ... Wait we're not done yet?
Uhm, Jura, Rinkah and I actually already know eachother... This is a bit awkward, though...
Oh? My armor was made in Nohr, Aella. It's the country I grew up in... Mostly, that is. Do you like it?
Black box? What are you talking about, 9S?
Are you sure, Chun-Li? Everyone in my family is a warrior...
Well... Armor is kind of a custom where I'm from... Y-you're making me a bit uncomfortable, Jura...
I agree, 9S, but wearing armor all the time is kind of a custom where I'm from... I definitely shouldn't have put it on today, though...
There's nothing to worry about, Elizabeth! I'm just so used to wearing this everywhere that I keep forgetting it isn't necessary anymore.
Well, armor also isn't of much use against magic, and we have quite a lot of that flying around on the battlefield...
Alright, I guess my gloves will be the first ones to go!
Despite the fact that they are made mostly of metal, my gloves are actually pretty flexible!
Something small it is then! It's way too warm to wear gloves anyway.
My hairband doesn't do much but I like the way it looks.
I like to think of my hairband as a lucky charm, but I'll have to do without it from now on.
This thing is always a hassle to take off, please bear with me.
Taking this armor off is always such a hassle... I know someone who designs clothes, maybe I should ask her for something more casual.
Let's see, I gotta untie this, and this, and that. And then... Sorry this takes so long, I should've put on something more casual.
This is going to take a while... What was I thinking putting this thing on today...
I'll show you some skin this time, I've teased you long enough. Heehee~
Don't worry, it won't just be my necklace, heehee~
Time to take off my shirt, then. I'll add the necklace as well!
Is anyone else feeling warm here? Time to take off my shirt I guess.
I should've just put on some normal pants, these leggings are such a pain sometimes...
Well, this had to happen. Hope you like them at least.
Off you come, don't let these people wait~
The quicker it goes, the quicker it'll be over.
I wish I was playing phoenix mode right now...
This feels a lot more uncomfortable that I expected...
I don't think I've ever knowingly done this in front of anyone, let alone strangers...
You're right about the guide, Ladybug, but it's my first time playing this and every little bit helps!
I-I'm not sure what you're talking about, Zone-tan, but I don't know if I like it...
Yeah, I get that a lot, Kimberly. I have never fought any other way, though, so it just feels normal to me.

state.text: Uhm... About that... Azura is... Nevermind, thanks for the offer, Shantae!

case.state: O-our gloves? W-what? ... A-are you... me? ...
Wait, another manakete? Are you one as well? I never even heard of any other living manaketes...
Y-yes, Nugi-chan, you're right... I-I think you're one of the f-first people to notice that...
You're definitely right, Marinette. I'm having fun here, and I'm always happy to see new faces!
You're definitely right, Marinette. I'm having fun here, and I'm always happy to see a new face!

Haha yes. You're right, Sei.
(Oh my, she has no idea...)
Oh, you fight with swords too, 9S? We should spar sometime!
A-android? What does that mean? My armor is custom-made by a Nohrian blacksmith, if that's any help to you...
And, well... I just don't like wearing shoes. It just feels wrong to me.
I guess that's what happens when your country is locked into a permanent war, though...
... Uhm... Thanks, Kira? ... (What's up with this guy?)
You're right about the guide, Marinette, but it's my first time playing this and every little bit helps!
I... Uh... You what? Synthetic? ...

Yeah, that's definitely true. I've been trained for combat from a young age. Nohr, where I grew up, was locked into a war for a very long time so I've seen my fair share of battles... It's all over now, though.
... But also, yep.
My h-husband? ... I wish...
Be careful with it, please. I really need that stone.
Be careful with it, though. It's kind of special to me...
Done and done! Let's keep going!
Here you go! You can try them on if you like, they are really comfy!
I'm all out of small stuff now, I promise that things will become more interesting!
My band is gone, I hope this is the last time I lose.
Glad that's done, it's starting to get warm in here.
There you go! I don't mind not wearing my armor, it's the taking it off part that sucks the most.
I'm ready, shall we continue?
The game can continue!
Done, now time for me to win this!
Seriously, I like them a lot, but they're not practical at all.
Anyway, it's time for me to focus!
What are you staring for? Not like my panties were hidden exactly...
Feel free to take a look, I don't really mind... Just don't tell Camilla... Or anyone, really...
There you go, you can take a look if you want... Just... Don't stare too much okay?
Hee hee~ You should see your faces.
No need to be embarrassed, we all knew what we signed up for... right?
Ah whatever, the whole point of this game is getting naked, isn't it?
Don't stare... You are just making this creepier than it needs to be...
Oh I shouldn't complain, I'm having a lot of fun here!
I-I have never seen this other Corrin before, Jura... A-also, I think he's a boy...
Uhm... Thanks?
"Corrin"? But I didn't lose, right? Wait, you? ... Who are you? What is going on?

state.text: So, C-corrin... Uhh... What's your dimension like?

case.state: So... Uhh, what's it going to be, C-Corrin?

state.text: So is your armor also made up of several different pieces?

case.state: "Corrin"? Which one, me or him?

state.text: It's time to free it, Corrin.

case.state: Link? You can talk? Why did you never say anything at the meetings?
W-well, m-me... It's time for you... me... Agh, you to strip.
Well, it's about time you joined me, ... me? Agh, can we just call each other Corrin? This is so weird...
Well, it doesn't really matter at this point... I-it's your time to strip now, I guess...
Come on, Neo, it's alright. We don't bite!
W-well, it doesn't really matter at this point... It's ~name~'s turn to strip, anyway...
I won a round! Now ~name~ has to take something off, right?
Yay, I won the first round! ~name~ has to take something off now, right?
Eh, whatever. I enjoyed myself.
Ohh what are you going to take off?
What are you going to show us?
Don't worry ~name~, I probably won't stay ahead for long. Heehee~
I'm doing pretty well for myself!
Sorry ~name~, it's your turn now!
~Name~ lost this hand right? What will you take off?
I'm sorry ~name~, you lost this one. I suggest playing a little safer!
I'm starting to like this game!
Another victory for me!
Don't stall too much, ~name~, you knew this had to happen at some point~
Rules are rules, ~name~.
Well, ~name~, what's it going to be?

state.text: Ohh what are you going to take off?

case.state: I'm sorry you had to sit through me taking that thing off... Please do it quickly okay?
It's getting pretty hot in here don't you think?
~Name~ lost! Nothing can stop me!
I've been waiting for this to happen!
Come on ~name~, don't disappoint us!
My confidence might have taken a hit but at least my skills haven't!
Please take off something big, ~name~.
Come on, ~name~, give me something nice to look at!
What are you going to take off?
Show us something good, ~name~!
I haven't lost yet!
I'm not doing too well over here, ~name~. Please take off something big.
C'mon ~name~, show me something I won't forget!
Ohh, give me something to work with, ~name~!
Yes! This is going to be so good!
I'd love for you to join me at some point, ~name~
Oh, don't mind me... Just hurry up a little...
Don't mind me, just play like you normally would!
So what will you take off, ~name~?
Hey! Where did you come from? Do you two know eachother?
T-there's another girl here? I thought it was just us...
So uhm, Aimee... Are you going to put down that ... thing?
Please tell me you are going to put away your... Whatever that is...

state.text: Don't tell me you are going to do that again... Oh gods...

case.state: Not again, Aimee... Wait, where are you shooting?
O-okay Aimee... P-please put down the gun and- ... Oh no...
Hm, do I know you from somewhere, Daisy? You seem familiar.
Oh! Felicia, have you ever heard about Kitsunes? You look a lot like one!
Now I know! Felicia, can you turn into an animal? You look a bit like a Hoshidan Kitsune.
So is there anything you can take off, Felicia?
What's next, Felicia? I don't know if you really have anything to take off or shave...
It's time for you to remove your mask!
Well, Spider-Woman, your mask is next!
Oh, bless you!
Lyn?... Wait, THE Lyn?
You again? Where does she keep coming from? I thought there wasn't anyone else here...

state.text: I'll believe it when I see it, Morrigan.

case.state: Nice outfit, Nugi-chan! I hope you're not as clumsy as Felicia. Heehee~
Hmm... Definitely as clumsy as Felicia... Are all maids like this?

state.text: Let me guess, your other belt? Your crown?

case.state: Wow, Pinkie. Your hair is very... eccentric. I haven't seen anything like it.
So, uh... What's it going to be this time, Pinkie? Not your skirt, right?
Y-you're not going to take off your underwear yet, r-right?
S-so what's it going to be, Pinkie? N-not your underwear already, right?
So, Pinkie, what's it going to be? I can never be sure with you...
I suppose you're replacing your dress now, right?
So, Rinkah. Long time no see!

state.text: *deep breath* (It's going to be okay, Corrin... Aimee knows what she's doing)
It's your turn again, Lau- Oh? Bless you!

case.state: Don't worry, Florina! You're going to be ok!
Just ignore them, Florina, you can do this!
You'll be fine, Florina, don't worry!
Come on, Neo, it's alright. We don't bite!
W-well, it doesn't really matter at this point... It's ~name~'s turn to strip, anyway...
I won a round! Now ~name~ has to take something off, right?
Yay, I won the first round! ~name~ has to take something off now, right?
~Name~ lost the hand, what happens now?
Eh, whatever. I enjoyed myself.
Yay, I'm winning!
Hmm... I'm doing well so far!
Ohh what are you going to take off?
Sorry ~name~, it's your turn now!
Do this quickly, ~name~, I want to continue playing!
Is this all part of a hidden tactic, ~name~?
Don't worry too much, ~name~. You'll be alright.
I'm starting to like this game!
Don't stall too much, ~name~, you knew this had to happen at some point~
Yay, I'm winning!
Ohh what are you going to take off?
What's it going to be, ~name~?
Better luck next round, ~name~!
Okay, ~name~, it's your turn!
Yeah! Let's go!
Come on ~name~, don't disappoint us!
Please make this less awkward for me, ~name~.
Please take off something big, ~name~. Anything to make this less uncomfortable...
Please tell me you are going to have a little bit of fun.
Make this interesting for us, ~name~!
Come on, ~name~. You lost, you can't back off now!
What are you going to take off?
I haven't lost yet!
~Name~? Oh, nice. I'm not out yet!
I'm not doing too well over here, ~name~. Please take off something big.
Show us something good, ~name~!
I guess you're still in the race...
So, what are you going to take off?
Just take it all off and join me, ~name~. It's much more fun that way!
No need to worry, ~name~, it's okay to lose!
You can do it, ~name~, I believe in you!
Just play like you normally would, ~name~, maybe I could learn something!
So what will you take off, ~name~?

state.text: Ohh your helmet? I've been waiting for this...

case.state: That cape... Wait, are you ... me? A male me? What is this?
D-did you pick N-nohr or Hosh... Wait, did you even have to...
Can we just call eachother Corrin? It's easier that way...
Y-your helmet? Oh gods...
I wonder...
Something small? Fine with me!
You still have small things? Maybe I should've brought more...
Just your ~clothing~? That's okay.
No matter how many defenses you have, I will win anyway!
Aww, just your ~clothing~?
Well, at least you are doing well...
So are you ready to actually start playing now?
Please take off a little bit more... It's more fun when we both have a chance...
This seems kind of insensitive... I mean, I'm almost naked and you are only taking off your ~clothing~...
For real?
This seems kind of insensitive... I mean, I'm naked, at least show me something interesting as well...
Seriously?
Wait, just your ~clothing~?
You look pretty good without that helmet... You should show your face more often. Heehee~
I'm so confused...
Ugh, I can't do this...
Alright, I need to calm down...
P-please don't look at me, Captain... I don't know if I can handle this...
This REALLY isn't helping...
Alright, let's continue!
Oh, your ~clothing~? You looked good wearing that.
Looks like you still have a long way to go, I hope you won't miss that piece!
Let's keep going!
I was hoping for something more...
Still, I'm one step closer to victory!
Don't pay too much attention to me, I shouldn't get angry at you for trying to win...
Well, can't blame you for trying to win...
Well, it's not like these dumb rules gave you a choice...
Rules are rules I suppose...
So justice really is an illusion after all...
Friendly reminder that I can transform into a dragon.
You were still wearing that? I lost harder than I thought...
Turns out I'm worse at this than at making tea... That says something, trust me.
Is this a joke? ... It's me, right? I'm the joke...
O-oh... M-maybe this was too much for her after all...
Oh no... I hope she's ok...
Eek! Bats! ... How did those get in here?
Headphones? What's that?

state.text: Bending? Oh, are you talking about some kind of magic?

case.state: L-Launch? W-what happened? Why is your hair blue?
Wow, Lady Lyndis. I have read so much about you, I'm honored to meet you!
H-hey, that's unfair! She can choose to lose whatever she wants...

state.text: That's an... odd accessory, Miko. What's it for?
So are you finally going to take off something bigger?

case.state: Oh, yeah.. I suppose that makes sense.
That is... Oddly normal, but not in a bad way.
How are things at the Flame Tribe?
Oh? She's playing along as well? ... The more the merrier I guess.
Aww, your cape? But looks so good on you...
First your cape and now your helmet? Aww...

state.text: Eh? Sh-Shimakaze... is that... fire?
I-is that fire? A-are you ok, Shimakaze?
Uhm... What happened to your boots?
F-first your gloves, and now your b-boots... What is happening?

case.state: Another explosion? ... Are you sure you're going to be ok?
Another one? ... I know this isn't as bad as it looks, but I'm still worried...
Your belt? That's a good first pick!
S-so... You have different personalities, right? ... This is certainly... interesting...
Is there something wrong, Launch? You're acting so different...
Small things count? That's nice to know!
What are you going to take off, ~name~?
You still have small things? Maybe I should've brought more...
Just your ~clothing~? That's okay.
I guess that's fine...
Just your ~clothing~? Seriously? ...
Oh... Just your ~clothing~?
Just taking off your ~clothing~ now...
Your ~clothing~? Seriously?
You still have things like that?
That's just mean...
For real?
Ugh, just your ~clothing~? Seriously?
What! You... Okay...
Ugh, really?
Your ~clothing~? Seriously? I didn't notice you were doing so well.
Don't mind me sitting here while you are just now taking off your ~clothing~...
That's ok, Florina. I think we're all a bit nervous about this... Well, except for her...
That's ok, Florina. I think we're all a bit nervous about this.
It's ok, Florina! We're in this together!
No worries, Florina! You can do this!
A-are you going to be alright? That looked bad...
Oh no... Are you going to be ok?
Oh no... Maybe that was a bit too much for her... A-are you sure she can continue playing?
Oh no... I think that one was a bit too much... W-wait, we're going to continue? Are you sure that'll be ok?

state.text: Don't worry about it, Blake. Animal ears are a sign of power where I come from!

case.state: Oh it's that thing. Could I take a look at it later, D.Va? I've never seen headphones before!

state.text: I feel the same way, Korra! My dragonstone works better if I'm barefoot as well!

case.state: Ahhh! Launch! What are you doing?
